sidebar.title: Projects
sidebar.emptyHint: Click the button above to create a project
sidebar.deleteWarning: This session contains messages. Deleting it will
sidebar.deleteWarningEnd: and cannot be recovered. Are you sure?
sidebar.deleteProjectWarningBold: permanently delete the project and all its sessions and messages
sidebar.deleteProjectWarningEnd: , and cannot be recovered. Are you sure?

chat.emptyHint: Send a message to start the conversation
chat.rollbackWarning: This will delete all messages after this point. This action cannot be undone.
chat.sshAutoApproveWarning: SSH commands will execute automatically without approval. Do not enable this on production or critical servers.

input.placeholderVision: Type a message, drag & drop or paste images...
input.placeholder: Type a message... (Shift+Enter for new line)
input.placeholderOverride: Disagree? Type your feedback to AI...
input.placeholderNoSession: Please create or select a chat first

toolCall.overrideApproval: User rejected this operation. User feedback: {{text}}
toolCall.overrideAsk: User rejected the provided options. User feedback: {{text}}
toolCall.shuvixProjectHint: AI requests to modify project configuration
toolCall.shuvixSettingHint: AI requests to modify system settings
toolCall.sshHint: SSH remote commands require user approval before execution

ssh.credentialTitle: SSH Remote Connection — Enter server credentials
ssh.credentialHint: Credentials are used for this connection only — never saved or sent to AI
ssh.securityWarning: Credentials are used for this connection only and will not be saved. Ensure you trust the target server — AI will execute commands on it.

sessionConfig.title: Session Config
sessionConfig.sshAutoApproveDesc: When enabled, SSH exec commands run automatically without per-command approval. Do not enable this on production or critical servers.

sessionEdit.title: Edit Session
sessionEdit.projectHint: After switching, the session will use the project's working directory and configuration

projectForm.name: Project Name
projectForm.pathHint: Working directory for tool execution. All relative paths are resolved from this directory.
projectForm.promptPlaceholder: Project-level prompt (works alongside the global prompt)
projectForm.dockerNotFound: Docker not detected. Please install and start Docker Desktop first.
projectForm.dockerHint: When enabled, bash commands run in an isolated Docker container with the project path mounted.
projectForm.dockerNotAvailable: Docker command is not available. Please ensure Docker Desktop is installed and running.
projectForm.dockerImageNotFound: Image not found locally. Please run docker pull <image> first and try again.
projectForm.dockerNoBash: This image does not support bash. Please choose an image with bash (e.g. python:latest).
projectForm.sandboxHint: When enabled, file tools cannot access files outside the workspace, and bash commands require confirmation before execution
projectForm.toolsReminder: Tools determine what capabilities the AI can use. Enabling more tools increases token usage per conversation — keep only what you need.
projectForm.toolsHint: Tools enabled by default when creating a new session. Can be adjusted per session.
projectForm.referenceDirsHint: AI can access files in these directories. Access mode controls read/write permissions in sandbox mode.
projectForm.refDirNotePlaceholder: Note (helps AI understand the directory purpose)
projectForm.archiveConfirmDesc: This project will be moved to Archived Projects and can be restored later.
projectForm.purposeTitle: What do you want to do with AI?
projectForm.purposeDesc: Pre-selects the right tools for your use case
projectForm.purposeCasualDesc: Simple tools combine into a powerful agent
projectForm.purposeDevDesc: Code writing, debugging, file I/O and other dev tasks
projectForm.extEmptyDesc: No extensions configured yet. MCP Servers and Skills give AI additional tools — head to Settings to add them.
projectForm.extMcpDesc: Connect external tool servers via MCP protocol, giving AI capabilities like database queries and API calls.
projectForm.extSkillDesc: Skills are reusable prompt templates that help AI master specific workflows.
projectForm.extAvailableDesc: Select which extensions to enable for this project.

settings.title: Settings
settings.systemPromptPlaceholder: Define the AI assistant's role and behavior...
settings.tokenUsageWarning: Agent mode consumes significantly more tokens than simple chat. It is recommended to monitor your usage or set spending limits on your provider's platform to avoid unexpected charges.
settings.syncFailed: Sync failed. Please check API Key and network settings.
settings.addModelPlaceholder: Enter model ID and press Enter to add
settings.baseUrlPlaceholder: Leave empty to use default URL
settings.httpLogDesc: Each AI request is logged for auditing and debugging.
settings.clearLogsConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all HTTP request logs? This action cannot be undone.
settings.selectLogHint: Select a log on the left to view request details.
settings.logNotFound: Log not found or has been cleared.
settings.toolsDesc: Configure runtime environment and behavior for each tool.
settings.toolBashDockerHint: When enabled, bash commands run in an isolated Docker container with the project path mounted
settings.toolBashResourceHint: Resource limits prevent the container from consuming too many system resources
settings.toolBashDockerNotInstalled: Docker not detected. Please install Docker Desktop first.
settings.toolBashDockerNotRunning: Docker is installed but the engine is not running. Please start Docker Desktop.
settings.toolSshDesc: Save SSH credentials for quick connection. AI can use saved credentials by name without prompting you each time.
settings.toolSshSecurityWarning: SSH credentials are encrypted and stored locally. Only save credentials for trusted servers. AI can use saved credentials to connect and execute commands directly.
settings.toolSshNameHint: Unique name the AI uses to reference this credential
settings.toolSshEmptyHint: Add credentials to let AI connect to remote servers directly
settings.mcpDesc: Configure MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers to extend AI with more tool capabilities.
settings.mcpEmptyHint: Add MCP Servers to extend AI with filesystem, database, browser automation and more.
settings.mcpHeadersPlaceholder: Key: Value format, one per line
settings.mcpDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete MCP Server "{{name}}"?
settings.skillDesc: Manage installed Skills. Skills are reusable instruction sets that teach AI how to complete specific tasks.
settings.skillEmptyHint: Add Skills to provide AI with domain expertise and workflow guidance.
settings.skillPasteHint: Paste SKILL.md file content (with YAML frontmatter)
settings.skillParseFailed: Parse failed: ensure content has valid YAML frontmatter (--- delimited, with name field)
settings.skillDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe when and how AI should use this skill
settings.skillDeleteConfirm: Delete Skill "{{name}}"? This will remove the entire skill directory.

about.license: This project is open source software released under the MIT License.

agent.askToolGuidance: When you need the user to choose between multiple approaches, styles, configurations, or directions, you MUST use the ask tool to present clickable option cards. Do NOT list numbered options in plain text for the user to reply manually.
agent.titleGenPrompt: You are a title generation assistant. Based on the first exchange between user and assistant, generate a concise title (no more than 10 words, no quotes or punctuation). Output only the title itself, nothing else.

tool.bashHint: Run terminal commands like installing packages, running scripts, or Git operations
tool.readHint: Read file contents — supports text, PDF, Word, Excel and more
tool.writeHint: Create a new file or overwrite an existing one; directories are created automatically
tool.editHint: Replace a specific text snippet in a file — ideal for small, precise changes
tool.askHint: AI asks you a question with clickable options to confirm direction
tool.lsHint: List files and folders in a directory as a tree structure
tool.grepHint: Search file contents by keyword or regular expression
tool.sshHint: Connect to a remote server via SSH and execute commands
tool.shuvixProjectHint: View or modify the current project config (sandbox, Docker, etc.)
tool.shuvixSettingHint: View or modify global app settings (language, theme, etc.)
tool.skillHint: Load predefined instruction sets to give AI domain-specific capabilities
